meanings.sent1: The diamond necklace was the priciest item in the store.
meanings.sent2: The designer handbag was the priciest accessory she owned.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her cat's taste in toys was as priciest as a royal's.
meanings.sent4: In the world of collectibles, rare stamps can be the priciest treasures.
meanings.sent5: The priciest painting at the auction fetched millions of dollars.

meanings.sent1: The priciest restaurant in town offers a luxurious dining experience.
meanings.sent2: The priciest seats at the concert were right in the front row.
meanings.sent3: His idea of a priciest gift was a bouquet of golden roses.
meanings.sent4: The priciest hotel suite overlooked the sparkling city lights.
meanings.sent5: The priciest car on the lot gleamed under the showroom lights.
